careerBackground: My IT career started over 10 years ago, when the digital revolution was well underway but green-screen terminals and COBOL batch jobs still ruled the roost in many enterprise outfits. It’s been hugely exciting to be part of an industry that’s going through such a big change. I’ve spent the past few years running development projects that meet the business need to move quickly, while navigating the complexities of Enterprise technology environments.
superHeroPower: I would like to have the ability to control the weather, so every day is sunny and rain overnight means I don't have to worry about watering the garden.
